name: Mr. Knucklehead
description:
The Rock Men have invaded the forest. It's up to the man with the fist for a head to save the day...
Help Mr. Knucklehead punch his way to victory!

This little minigame was made for Low Rez Jam 2016. Enjoy!

--Version 1.01--

  • Fixed bug in shader that could cause the game to crash on startup.
  • Fixed bug that could allow you to climb walls by punching them repeatedly.
